documentation.text: @notice List a item on sale by auction.
@notice Instant buy a specific item on sale.

@notice Owner take an offer to sell their item.
 Requirements:
 - Cannot take offer under item's `floorPrice`.
 - Offer value must be at least equal to `minPrice`.
@notice Cancels an offer for a specific item.
@notice List a item on sale by auction.
@notice Instant buy a specific item on sale.

@notice Owner take an offer to sell their item.
 Requirements:
 - Cannot take offer under item's `floorPrice`.
 - Offer value must be at least equal to `minPrice`.
@notice Cancels an offer for a specific item.

buy(uint256,uint256).notice: Instant buy a specific item on sale.

cancelOffer(uint256).notice: Cancels an offer for a specific item.

listByAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: List a item on sale by auction.

offer(uint256,uint256).notice: Gives offer for a item. Requirements: - Owner cannot offer.

takeOffer(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Owner take an offer to sell their item. Requirements: - Cannot take offer under item's `floorPrice`. - Offer value must be at least equal to `minPrice`.
